item.A:

traditional: 殘酷
cánkù cruel; cruelty

traditional: 收縮
shōusuō pull back; shrink; contract

traditional: 談判
tánpàn to negotiate; negotiation; conference
dàzhì more or less; roughly; approximately
bànnián half a year

traditional: 優秀
yōuxiù outstanding; excellent
tōngzhī notify; inform; notice; notification
yuánzhù aid; assistance; support; help
lìfǎ legislation

traditional: 個體
gètǐ individual

traditional: 反動派
fǎndòngpài reactionaries

traditional: 電容
diànróng capacitance

traditional: 友誼
yǒuyì companionship; fellowship; friendship

traditional: 好處
hǎochu benefit; advantage
zhèngrú be just like
wángcháo dynasty

traditional: 萬一
wànyī just in case; if by any chance; contingency
